import React, { useState } from 'react' import Swap from './Swap' import Limit from './Limit' import CrossChain from './CrossChain' export default function Tabs() { const [name, setname] = useState('swap'); const [showmenu, setShowMenu] = useState(false); return ( <>
{ showmenu ?
{ setShowMenu(!showmenu) }}>
: null }
{ name == 'swap' ? : name == "limit" ? : }
) }
